name: Reliant Toshima Turret
name_cn: 信赖 丰岛 炮塔
description:
Item Type: Turret (Reliant Exclusive)
Manufacturer: MISC
Size: 4
Specifically built to be used exclusively on the MISC Reliant, the Toshima turret system comes with a camera that can be remoted into while providing a wide range of motion for two Size-2 weapons.
description_cn:
物品类型：炮塔(信赖专用)
制造商：武藏工业与星航株式会社(MISC)
尺寸：4
“丰岛”炮塔系统特别为武藏的信赖制造，有着用于远程操控的摄像机，为两个S2武器提供了宽广的视野。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-奥里森(Orison)-乌鸦表哥
